Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder of a brown pottery ribbed vessel, the interior is covered with a yellow-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and very faint traces of one line of red-painted Coptic text and some impressed annular decoration.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394135) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394135)
